thread.title: West Carleton Secondary School closed today due to natural gas leak
thread.title_full: West Carleton Secondary School closed today due to natural gas leak

author: cbc
title: West Carleton Secondary School closed today due to natural gas leak
text:
West Carleton Secondary School closed for the day after a natural gas leak prompted an evacuation of the school.
An unusual smell was reported Tuesday morning at the school in the small community of Dunrobin in rural west Ottawa, according to the Ottawa-Carleton District School Board.
Students were transported to Earl of March Secondary School in Kanata, about a 20-minute drive away, as a precaution.
Coun. Eli El-Chantiry said there was a natural gas leak somewhere along the building's exterior and that crews were on site making repairs.
According to the board, gas service repairs were finished Tuesday afternoon and staff and students will return to school on Wednesday.
